page.title: 11 AMENITIES
page.content: Our study area offers very few amenities to the local inhabitants, most people travelling to nearby Newport and Cardiff for leisure time pursuits.A Community Centre in Marshfield,provides a meeting place for seasonal activities,also pre school nursery group,Brownies and Guides,while adult education groups, e.g.ballroom,dancing,meet here.The Baptist church Hall,Gateway,provides Youth Activities for ages 7yrs-17yrs,while the Y.M.F.S.Institute in Castleton is a meeting place for Women's Institute,Mother and Toddler Group,and Football Club for boys aged 5 - I2years.
